title: Dispose Water Bottles in Recycle Bin
question: I will put disposable plastic bottles and aluminum cans in the recycling bin instead of the trash

title: Hand-Me-Down/Thrift
question: I will use hand-me-downs thrift instead of buying

title: Reusable Bags
question: I will use my own reusable bag to shop

title: Sustainable Tupperware
question: I will use re-washable plates utensils and Tupperware rather than using plastic or Styrofoam
